title: Virtual Population Visualisation
text:
Patient Recruitment


Conventional approaches to clinical trial design often neglect logistical issues, such as recruiting patients.


KerusCloud allows you recruit patients from up to 10 sites.

title: Virtual Population Visualisation
text:
Patient Recruitment
 :::fragment KerusCloud allows you to modify recruitment rates between sites and over time. :::

title: Virtual Population Visualisation
text:
Example Project

Low-incidence rate, across several countries to test vaccine - so need to recruit large number of patients across multiple countries.
Create a KerusCloud Virtual Population with recruitment sites in 4 different countries, baseline patient data and time to event variable of disease occurrence.
How do I handle these complex data?
